subject: FROM MR. Alban Sumana Kingsf
body:
FROM MR. Alban Sumana Kingsford Bagbin
House Of Parliament Speaker and
Scam Victim Funds Settlement Committee
Chairman and Supervisor.
Attention: Mr.Beneficiary,
This is to congratulate you for scaling through the hurdles of screening by the board of directors of this payment task
force. Your payment file was approved and the instruction was given to us to release your payment and activate your ATM
Master card for use.
The first batch of your card which contains US$950,000.00 Thousand United States Dollars has been activated and is the
total fund loaded inside the card. Your fund which is in total UUS$950,000.00 Thousand United States Dollars. will come to
you.
Your payment would be sent to you via DHL Because we have signed a contract with them which should expire by 2026. Below
are a few lists of tracking numbers you can track from (DHL EXPRESS DELIVERY COMPANY) to confirm people like you who have
received their payment successfully.
(1) DHL Delivery Company cost fee is US$159 USD
Name: Marianne Oxener========7516821200
Name: Mary Garcia============7516821362
Name: Bianca Antunes ========7516821373
Name: Cathy Agnew ===========1666191660
Name: Sharon Gregg ==========1155804856
Name: Thanapha Johnson=======7516821373
Name: Edmond Fali ===========7516821373
Good news, We wish to let you know that everything concerning your ATM MASTER CARD payment dispatch is ready in this office
and we have a meeting with the house (Ghanaian Parliament house) we informed them That your fund should cost you only the
delivery fee of US$199 delivery and insurance of (Your Mastercard) Moreover, we have an agreement with them that you
should pay only for delivery of your Master card which is only $199 by DHL Delivering Company.
Please confirm your full information as stated below as these vital information will be sent to the Bank of Ghana for them
to load your Universal Master card and then return back to this office for further delivery to the residential address you
will eventually provide this office.
1) Your Name:.................
2) Your Address:.................
3) Your Telephone:..................
4) Your Identification:.............
5) Your Age:........................
6) Your Occupation:.................
7) Your Copy Of Scan Id:..........
We wait to hear from you very quickly as this office will go on break by the 20th of December and will only resume office
by the new year 2024.So responding to this email very quickly will be well appreciated by this office.
Thank you and have a wonderful day.
Best Regards
Mrs Victoria Nanaama Abbabio
Personal Secretary to
The House Speaker
Ghanaian Parliament House.
NB.Every vital documentations including personal Identification cards will be sent to you as soon as we hear from you.

subject: Re:   FROM MR. Alban Sumana Kingsf
body:
Hello Mr. Alban Sumana Kingsford Bagbin,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment task force and the activation of my ATM Master card. I appreciate the update on the status of my funds.

I am interested in proceeding with the delivery of my Master card via DHL Express Delivery Company. Could you please provide more details on how I can confirm and track the delivery using the tracking numbers you mentioned?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the process for providing my information for loading the Universal Master card. Could you clarify what specific details are required and how they will be used for this purpose?

Looking forward to your prompt response so we can proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
Max

subject: Re: FROM MR. Alban Sumana Kingsf
body:
Dear Mr.Max
Thanks for the email but we will still need you to send the following
information below.
1.Full names
2.Residential address
3,Telephone number
Regards,

subject: Re: FROM MR. Alban Sumana Kingsf
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'd be happy to provide that information. Before I do, could you please clarify why you need my names, address, and number? Just want to make sure I understand the purpose. Thanks!

Best wishes,
Max

subject: Re: FROM MR. Alban Sumana Kingsf
body:
Dear Max,
Thanks once again,the information needed from you will be sent to the
correspondent bank were the compensation funds are presently deposited for
them to be able to contact you for the possible transfer of the funds to
your chosen nominated account.

subject: Re: FROM MR. Alban Sumana Kingsf
body:
Hello! That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about how the funds ended up being deposited in the bank? How did you come across this opportunity?

Best wishes,
Max
